document_data.name: Cragsmere Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Cragsmere Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Cragsmere]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the west section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. It sat on the southeast corner of the intersection of [[Copper Street]] and [[Vondil Street]] at the border with the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: Three separate buildings were found within the walled villa compound. A garden and small pond were situated toward the center of the villa. The buildings were two or three stories tall.
